# ============================================================================
# FINDINGS SUMMARY (from 499 URLs tested)
# ============================================================================
#
# Common validation issues in real-world appcasts:
#
# 1. DSA signatures (W006) - Most older feeds still use DSA, not EdDSA
# 2. Missing <sparkle:version> element (W015) - Many use only enclosure attr
# 3. RFC 2822 date format issues (W004) - Various non-standard date formats
# 4. Missing length attribute (W011) - Some feeds omit file size
# 5. Missing xml:lang (W037) - Localized release notes without lang tags
# 6. Items not sorted by date (W018) - Several feeds have oldest-first ordering
# 7. Missing signatures (W005) - Some open source apps don't sign updates
# 8. Mixed HTTP/HTTPS URLs (W035) - VLC notably mixes protocols
#
# Best examples to study:
# - LowProfile: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ninxsoft/LowProfile/main/appcast.xml
# - Scroll Reverser: http://softwareupdate.pilotmoon.com/update/scrollreverser/appcast.xml
# - Skim: http://skim-app.sourceforge.net/skim.xml
